about_the_game:
Cognition determines the way one sees reality, while cognition is just a reflection of reality.


Somewhere nobody is concerned, with a simple click, a camera's screen lights up. Only one thing needs it this time: witness an ordinary girl's life.



Try different view angles, change parameters, rotate the zoom ring, and find the truth in the misplaced memories.

Features

All Doe's Life is a single-player puzzle game. You will be a photographer and
  • Find unreasonable parts in the scenes through viewfinder
  • Take photos to capture the truth, restore scenes to what it actually is
  • See what's happened at the place in the girl's memory
  • Explore more stories and insights into the girl's life
  • Meet the girl's family, friends and other relationships
  • Enjoy the hand-drawn artwork
  • Witness the girl's ending

How to Play

  • Move the mouse to rotate the view
  • Use the mouse wheel to adjust focal length
  • Press space to take a photo

short_description: It's a story of a small-town girl with no name. You're going on a one-person journey with a camera, find the right angle, then press the shutter. Look closely, solve the puzzles, and see each different side of her.
